title: Leader's High!
sinopse:
Daichi's father is the principal at a school for budding young magicians, but Daichi couldn't care less about magic. When his parents abruptly disappear, Daichi is shocked to find himself appointed to take his father's place! Yozora, the beautiful student council President, is convinced that she's destined to be with Daichi, thanks to a fake TV psychic. This pits Daichi against a jealous student council at the same time he has to deal with a resentful teacher who keeps trying to engage Daichi in bouts of wizardry. Who says magical powers is something cool?

(Source: CMX)
